definitions.definition: A type of lettering form written lower than the things around it.
examples: In chemical formulas the number of atoms in a molecule is written as a subscript , so we write H 2 O for water which has two atoms of hydrogen for each one of oxygen.

definitions.definition: An index into an array or hash .

main_definition: ( typography ) A type of lettering form written lower than the things around it.
secondary_definitions: ( programming ) An index into an array or hash .
